name: Forest
description: A dense forest full of goblins and wolves.

name: Cave
description: A dark cave inhabited by bats and trolls.

name: Desert
description: A vast desert with sandworms and scorpions.

name: Mountain
description: A high mountain range with yetis and rock golems.

name: Swamp
description: A murky swamp filled with lizardmen and giant frogs.
